name: Godkiller 2: Exile: New Timeline Edition
overview: When you open the Mnar's portal you jump back into the timestream but something strange happens, you are expelled from the stream by something or by someone. You are in the Citadel of Dis, the City of the Damned A hellish place beyond the space time continuum where gods, demons and other supernatural creatures are exiled for their sins against the Source. In this plane the divine powers are negated and even with your direct connection to the Primary Source you notice how all your supernatural powers are automatically sealed. You must escape and regain your powers for the final battle.
